speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: SCENE III. Another part of the island.

speaker: TRINCULO
text_entry: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO, ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: By'r lakin, I can go no further, sir;

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: My old bones ache: here's a maze trod indeed

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Through forth-rights and meanders! By your patience,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I needs must rest me.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Old lord, I cannot blame thee,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Who am myself attach'd with weariness,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: To the dulling of my spirits: sit down, and rest.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Even here I will put off my hope and keep it

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: No longer for my flatterer: he is drown'd

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Whom thus we stray to find, and the sea mocks

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Our frustrate search on land. Well, let him go.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: [Aside to SEBASTIAN]  I am right glad that he's so

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: out of hope.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Do not, for one repulse, forego the purpose

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That you resolved to effect.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: [Aside to ANTONIO]  The next advantage

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Will we take throughly.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: [Aside to SEBASTIAN]  Let it be to-night;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: For, now they are oppress'd with travel, they

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Will not, nor cannot, use such vigilance

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As when they are fresh.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: [Aside to ANTONIO]  I say, to-night: no more.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Solemn and strange music

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: What harmony is this? My good friends, hark!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Marvellous sweet music!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Enter PROSPERO above, invisible. Enter several  strange Shapes, bringing in a banquet;  they dance about it with gentle actions of  salutation; and, inviting the King,  and c. to eat, they depart

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Give us kind keepers, heavens! What were these?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A living drollery. Now I will believe

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: That there are unicorns, that in Arabia

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: There is one tree, the phoenix' throne, one phoenix

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: At this hour reigning there.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I'll believe both;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And what does else want credit, come to me,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And I'll be sworn 'tis true: travellers ne'er did

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: lie,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Though fools at home condemn 'em.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: If in Naples

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I should report this now, would they believe me?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: If I should say, I saw such islanders--

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: For, certes, these are people of the island--

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Who, though they are of monstrous shape, yet, note,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Their manners are more gentle-kind than of

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Our human generation you shall find

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Many, nay, almost any.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: [Aside]              Honest lord,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Thou hast said well; for some of you there present

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Are worse than devils.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I cannot too much muse

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Such shapes, such gesture and such sound, expressing,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Although they want the use of tongue, a kind

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Of excellent dumb discourse.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: [Aside] Praise in departing.

speaker: FRANCISCO
text_entry: They vanish'd strangely.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: No matter, since

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: They have left their viands behind; for we have stomachs.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Will't please you taste of what is here?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Not I.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Faith, sir, you need not fear. When we were boys,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Who would believe that there were mountaineers

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Dew-lapp'd like bulls, whose throats had hanging at 'em

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Wallets of flesh? or that there were such men

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Whose heads stood in their breasts? which now we find

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Each putter-out of five for one will bring us

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Good warrant of.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I will stand to and feed,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Although my last: no matter, since I feel

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The best is past. Brother, my lord the duke,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Stand to and do as we.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Thunder and lightning. Enter ARIEL, like a  harpy; claps his wings upon the table; and, with a quaint device, the banquet vanishes

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: You are three men of sin, whom Destiny,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: That hath to instrument this lower world

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: And what is in't, the never-surfeited sea

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Hath caused to belch up you; and on this island

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Where man doth not inhabit; you 'mongst men

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Being most unfit to live. I have made you mad;

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: And even with such-like valour men hang and drown

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Their proper selves.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: ALONSO, SEBASTIAN  and c. draw their swords

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: You fools! I and my fellows

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Are ministers of Fate: the elements,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Of whom your swords are temper'd, may as well

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Wound the loud winds, or with bemock'd-at stabs

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Kill the still-closing waters, as diminish

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: One dowle that's in my plume: my fellow-ministers

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Are like invulnerable. If you could hurt,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Your swords are now too massy for your strengths

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: And will not be uplifted. But remember--

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: For that's my business to you--that you three

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: From Milan did supplant good Prospero;

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Exposed unto the sea, which hath requit it,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Him and his innocent child: for which foul deed

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: The powers, delaying, not forgetting, have

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Incensed the seas and shores, yea, all the creatures,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Against your peace. Thee of thy son, Alonso,

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: They have bereft; and do pronounce by me:

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Lingering perdition, worse than any death

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Can be at once, shall step by step attend

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: You and your ways; whose wraths to guard you from--

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Which here, in this most desolate isle, else falls

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: Upon your heads--is nothing but heart-sorrow

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: And a clear life ensuing.

speaker: ARIEL
text_entry: He vanishes in thunder; then, to soft music  enter the Shapes again, and dance, with mocks and mows, and carrying out the table

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Bravely the figure of this harpy hast thou

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Perform'd, my Ariel; a grace it had, devouring:

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Of my instruction hast thou nothing bated

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In what thou hadst to say: so, with good life

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And observation strange, my meaner ministers

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Their several kinds have done. My high charms work

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And these mine enemies are all knit up

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: In their distractions; they now are in my power;

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And in these fits I leave them, while I visit

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Young Ferdinand, whom they suppose is drown'd,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: And his and mine loved darling.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Exit above

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I' the name of something holy, sir, why stand you

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: In this strange stare?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: O, it is monstrous, monstrous:

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Methought the billows spoke and told me of it;

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The winds did sing it to me, and the thunder,

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: That deep and dreadful organ-pipe, pronounced

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: The name of Prosper: it did bass my trespass.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Therefore my son i' the ooze is bedded, and

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: I'll seek him deeper than e'er plummet sounded

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: And with him there lie mudded.

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Exit

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: But one fiend at a time,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I'll fight their legions o'er.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I'll be thy second.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Exeunt SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: All three of them are desperate: their great guilt,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Like poison given to work a great time after,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Now 'gins to bite the spirits. I do beseech you

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: That are of suppler joints, follow them swiftly

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And hinder them from what this ecstasy

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: May now provoke them to.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Follow, I pray you.

speaker: ADRIAN
text_entry: Exeunt
